content: simple alpine stitch headband simple alpine design by chloe fletcher stitch headband design by chloe fletcher simple alpine stitch headband design by chloe fletcher you will need 4 mm crochet hook 80-100 yards of dk yarn this pattern is written in uk crochet terms foundation and set-up row 1 chain 88 o note the number of stitches in the foundation chain can be adjusted in increments/decrements of 2 stitches to fit the desired head size chaining 88 will fit a medium/large adult head 23 circumference row 2 chain 1 turn starting from the 2nd stitch from the hook double_crochet into each stitch across row 3 chain 1 turn treble_crochet into each stitch across alpine stitch pattern row 4 chain 1 turn double_crochet into each stitch across row 5 chain 1 turn treble_crochet into the 1st stitch from the hook fpdc into the 2nd treble_crochet from the row below treble_crochet into the next stitch ensure that you skip the stitch that sits behind the fpdc alternate fpdc and treble_crochet across in the last stitch of the row use treble_crochet o note remember to keep gauge loose on fpdcs to maintain row height row 6 chain 1 turn double_crochet into each stitch across row 7 chain 1 turn treble_crochet into the first 2 stitches then alternate fpdc and treble_crochet to the end of the row repeat row 4 7 three times or until the desired width of the headband is reached to finish row 8 chain 1 turn double_crochet into each stitch across fasten_off row 9 turn fasten on to the top left corner slip_stitch blo across fasten_off weave in ends abbreviations blo back loop only double_crochet double_crochet dk double knit fpdc front-post double crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch treble_crochet treble_crochet
